metadata.title: CVE-2023-4387 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in vmxnet3_rq_alloc_rx_buf indrivers/net/vmxnet3/vmxnet3_drv.c in VMware's vmxnet3 ethernet NIC driverin the Linux Kernel. This issue could allow a local attacker to crash thesystem due to a double-free while cleaning up vmxnet3_rq_cleanup_all, whichcould also lead to a kernel information leak problem.
